00:00 Kit Connor in Talks for the Lead Role in the Elden Ring Film
There's news about the "Elden Ring" film adaptation! According to industry magazine Deadline, "Warfare" star Kit Connor is in talks for the lead role.

01:22 Rumor: "Euphoria" Star to Play Princess Zelda in "The Legend of Zelda"
Fans of the iconic video game series "The Legend of Zelda" can rejoice: the long-awaited live-action film adaptation is set to be released in cinemas on March 26, 2027. Fittingly, a rumor from the experienced Hollywood insider Daniel Richtman is now making the rounds that "Euphoria" star Hunter Schafer is being considered for the role of Princess Zelda.
